content: It's true that the conversation around mental health has come a long way in recent years. there is now more awareness and acceptance of the fact that mental health is a critical issue that can affect anyone, regardless of age, gender, race, or socioeconomic status. this increased awareness has helped to reduce the stigma around mental health struggles and encouraged more people to seek help when they need it. keanu reeves and other advocates have played an important role in bringing attention to these issues and pushing for change. we still have a long way to go, but it's heartening to see the progress that's been made and the growing momentum behind efforts to promote mental health and well-being.
